query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(date_filed) AS month, nov_category_description, count(*) AS total_violations, assigned_division, status WHERE date_filed >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY month, nov_category_description, assigned_division, status ORDER BY month, nov_category_description, assigned_division, status

date_filed.description: Date that the complaint was filed

assigned_division.description: Division that is currently assigned to the complaint

status.description: Current status of the complaint (active or not active)

table_metadata.title: Notices of Violation issued by the Department of Building Inspection
table_metadata.description: Records indicating actual violations and comments by the inspector found during an inspection, sortable by Complaint Number and Item Sequence Number. Users can connect this with the Department of Building Inspection Complaints dataset for a comprehensive view.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Property owners, tenants, housing authorities, city planners
